aboutItems.title: International Baccalaureate
aboutItems.desc: International Baccalaureate alumni, graduated from the bilingual diploma programme.

aboutItems.title: B.Sc. Computer Science
aboutItems.desc: Aspiring computer scientist studying in Mexico at Monterrey Institute of Technology.

aboutItems.title: PADI Open Water Diver
aboutItems.desc: Obtained the basic level of diving certificate issued by PADI. Meets ISO 24801-2: Autonomous diver standard.

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.info: An implementation of what I like the most (Pokemon) with the help of PokeAPI. A pokedex that fetches data from the API, implemented simple backend with Flask.

projects.title: Stolen Voices
projects.info: A decision-making story game that aims to raise awareness that the victim's decision should never be used to justify the aggressor's actions. Made with Twine.

projects.title: Social C
projects.info: Private social media build using React and Firebase, with Reactstrap as a CSS framework for React. Post To-Dos, memories and suggest music with your private circle.

experiences.description: Global campaign aimed to address the consequences of the climate crisis on Tuvalu. My role has been to plan innovative projects, and maintain the tech.
